<a name="Closable"></a>
## type [Closable](<https://github.com/0chain/gosdk/blob/staging/zmagmacore/shutdown/shutdown.go#L19-L21>)

Closable represents interface for types that might be closed.

```go
type Closable interface {
    Close() error
}
```
